name: 18 Wheels of Steel: Extreme Trucker 2
description: Non-Stop Extreme Driving Action! Take this Job and Love It! Build your trucking empire from a single hauler to a vast network of convoys crisscrossing the globeâ€™s most extreme roads. Can you feel the hair on your neck raise?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7 Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB AGP DierctX 9 and T&L compatible video accelerator card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 540 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: I left the 'Extreme Trucker 2 has stopped working' window open for 5 minutes.  TL;DR: 18WOS:ET2 is an interesting game where a little window pops up and you get to click a little button after waiting however long you like to return to Steam.
I don't like not being able to just drive to different areas. Instead you can only pick a load and just go on a slow journey for a couple minutes. Don't waste your $10. Not worth it.
